title: The Streetfighter Trilogy (Sonny Chiba) DVD H264
description:
The Streetfighter (1974) (Gekitotsu! Satsujin ken)

Terry is a tough, mercenary, master of martial arts. When an important business magnate dies, leaving billions to his daughter, the Mafia and Yakuza try to hire Terry to kidnap the daughter. When they refuse to meet his exorbitant price, then try to kill him to conceal their secret plans, he promptly offers his services to protect her. Much ultra-violent martial-arts fighting action, as expected, ensues. This also includes a subplot of a family's bloodfeud with Terry over a disputed debt.

Return of the Street Fighter (1974) (Satsujin ken 2)

Takuma "Terry" Tsurugi returns. In this sequel, he sets out to bust up a phony charity put together by the Yukuza. 

The Streetfighter's Last Revenge (1974) (GyakushÃƒÂ»! Satsujin ken)

Terry Sugury is hired to recover one of two tapes containing a formula for making heroin for a price of 200 dollars a pound. But he gets double crossed. So he wants the tape back.
